headline: American Airlines to roll out free Wi-Fi for loyalty program members
summary: "Free high-speed Wi-Fi isn't just a perk — ‍it's essential for today's travelers," Heather Garboden, chief customer officer of American ​Airlines, said in a statement.  In ‌2023, Delta Air Lines became the first major U.S. carrier to offer free in-flight Wi-Fi in partnership with T-Mobile.  In 2025, ⁠United Airlines partnered with ​Elon Musk's Starlink ​for in-flight internet services.
